div.p: The 9th Annual ZendCon will bring together developers, IT managers and PHP experts from around the world. With a focus on PHP, mobile and cloud development, attendees at this highly acclaimed conference will expand their skills and explore new technologies.

ZendCon provides unique opportunities to learn from a wide variety of technical sessions, hear keynote presentations from thought leaders, and engage with prominent PHP speakers and vendors. Youâ€™ll learn about the latest innovations and network with peers to solve PHP challenges
The conference is scheduled from October 7-10, 2013. For more information, visit http://www.zendcon.com/.
